nodesToRead.speaker: Trish
lines: Heyyy! You're new around here ain'tcha?!
Well come on, don't be shy! I don't peck!
I'm Trish! I'm in charge of running Trivia night here at the Boozy Burrow!
The way it works is that I'll ask ya a quick question, and if you give me a right answer, you win some cold hard cash!
But I also have to understand what you're saying, cause I'm not a mind reader.
